data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rainer Sonnenberg, Thomas Blum, Bernhard Y. Misof (2006): Description of a new Episemion species (Cyprinodontiformes: Nothobranchiidae) from northern Gabon and southeastern Equatorial Guinea. Zootaxa 1361: 1-20, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:E03B6B46-4B30-4D8C-990E-32FEAF3FB143|6 occurrences
